sn55.12:4.4: ‘ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, kālasseva uṭṭhāya pācīnamukho yāhi.
sn55.12:4.5: So tvaṃ mā sobbhaṃ parivajjehi, mā papātaṃ, mā khāṇuṃ, mā kaṇḍakaṭhānaṃ, mā candaniyaṃ, mā oḷigallaṃ.
sn55.12:4.6: Yattha papateyyāsi tattheva maraṇaṃ āgameyyāsi.
sn55.12:4.7: Evaṃ tvaṃ, ambho purisa, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissasī’ti.
sn55.12:5.1: Taṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇānaṃ bālagamanametaṃ mūḷhagamanametaṃ na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati.
sn55.12:5.2: Ahañca kho, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye udayagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ paññāpemi;
sn55.12:5.3: yā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
sn55.12:6.1: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, udayagāminī paṭipadā;
sn55.12:6.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.12:6.5: itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho … pe …
sn55.12:6.9: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.12:6.11: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, udayagāminī paṭipadā ekantanibbidāya … pe …
